en.title: My Portfolio
en.description: Explore a selection of my recent projects and creative works.

• Collaborated with UX/UI and back-end teams to built and develop kotobee-books platform for publishing interactive e-books and connecting thousands of writers and readers around the world.
  • Migrated a multi-page user experience into a single page app, improving user engagement using Vue.js.

• Develop a Kotobee Academy page with categorized video tutorials, tabbed navigation, and filtering/search tools to enhance user learning of Kotobee Author. The page will feature responsive design, pop-up windows for video display and extra info, and integrate seamlessly with the main Kotobee website.

• Produced multiple visual elements of responsive web pages and interactive e-book contents for Kotobee Platform by translating UI/UX design wireframes into code, producing high quality markup using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript that works across many different screens and various platforms.
  • Create +180 interactive and responsive e-books layouts and templates using Kotobee Author platform.
  • Building reusable code for next projects and future use.
Building responsive website with buildings portfolio for a construction and engineering company.
Collaborated in building new landing web sections pages for Quranflash app website.

In this interactive experience, the movement of planets comes to life with dynamic effects, offering a visually engaging way to explore space. Creative animations, interactive diagrams, and animated planetary motions provide a deeper understanding of space and the solar system. Features like accordion menus and additional interactive elements allow users to dive into detailed information about space and planets in a more immersive and engaging way.

Plant Anatomy is an interactive sample e-book offers an engaging exploration of Plant Anatomy, covering the study of plant shape, structure, size, and more. Featuring dynamic elements such as embedded videos and interactive image sliders, the e-book allows users to explore plant structures in detail, providing a rich, hands-on learning experience. Dive deeper into the fascinating world of plant anatomy with these multimedia tools that bring the content to life.

Aromatherapy is a holistic healing practice that harnesses the power of natural plant extracts to promote overall health and well-being. In our interactive e-book, the experience is enriched with engaging animations, dynamic hover effects, and creative interactivity cards, allowing users to explore the world of aromatherapy in a more immersive and informative way.

In this interactive sample e-book, we enhance your learning experience with dynamic charts carousels, and engaging animations, providing a creative and immersive way to explore the world of Yoga from home.

ar.description: ¡Déjate llevar al mundo de los postres deliciosos con Sweet Scoops! Esta aplicación es el paraíso de los amantes de los postres, ofreciendo una amplia gama de recetas deliciosas, instrucciones paso a paso y videos para crear tus dulces favoritos. Desde cremosos helados hasta irresistibles pasteles, Sweet Scoops tiene todo lo que necesitas para satisfacer tus antojos de postres. Libera al chef de repostería que llevas dentro y date un caprichoso y delicioso experiencia de postre.

This tool is designed to streamline the process of extracting inline styles from multiple HTML files and consolidating them into a single external CSS file. By analyzing the HTML content, it automatically identifies all inline style attributes and transfers them to a centralized CSS file, organizing the rules and selectors accordingly. Once the extraction is complete, the tool cleans up the HTML files by removing the inline styles, ensuring the documents are more maintainable, efficient, and ready for external styling.
